title: 自定义npc mod崩溃 版本1.7.10
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Surprise! Haha. Well, this is awkward.
Time: 14-10-3 下午12:12
Description: Ticking entity
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Don't know how to add class noppes.npcs.entity.EntityCustomNpc!
 at net.minecraft.entity.EntityTrackerEntry.func_151260_c(EntityTrackerEntry.java:706)
 at net.minecraft.entity.EntityTrackerEntry.func_73117_b(EntityTrackerEntry.java:434)
 at net.minecraft.entity.EntityTracker.func_85172_a(EntityTracker.java:337)
 at net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayerMP.func_70071_h_(EntityPlayerMP.java:382)
 at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72866_a(World.java:2610)
 at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.func_72866_a(WorldServer.java:834)
 at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72870_g(World.java:2563)
 at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72939_s(World.java:2375)
 at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.func_72939_s(WorldServer.java:665)
 at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:937)
 at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:422)
 at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:803)

有人知道原因吗,npc生物发射铁斧会不会有问题

replies.txt_content: 求解决，人多了，玩着玩着就出问题
